title: Antiques for Everyone
brief_description: Antiques for Everyone dispels the myth that antiques are only for the rich, the collector or the expert. Renowned collector and antique dealer Kerry Trollope, takes you on an informative journey through the fascinating world of antiques of the 18th and 19th century. Covering four areas - glass, furniture, porcelain and silver - he explains dating techniques, restoration, various technical terms, investment aspects and the interesting combination of using antiques in a contemporary atmosphere. Rated: G
